message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $60, you take $40.  It's important to settle this quickly because of the inflation.
I think we can both do better than that. Let's split it more evenly this time, how about I take $55 and you take $45?  We can still both get a good deal if we settle quickly.
Bob, the value is decreasing rapidly.  I'll take a little less this time - $55 to my $45. Let's get this settled!
